task.summary: Fixed the bug for blank page on the main page
Fixed the events page now it openes the events
Fixed the events page now it openes the events

Refactor Profile.jsx and update IDE-specific settings
Refactored Profile.jsx to improve readability and handle edge cases for user data (e.g., missing fields). Updated .idea configurations to reflect recent changes, ensuring smoother local development without affecting project functionality.

Add Avatar component and enhance SearchResults UX
Introduced a reusable Avatar component with styling for consistent user avatars. Refactored SearchResults to improve search functionality, user feedback, and inline form handling. Additionally, updated styles for better responsiveness and alignment with design standards.

Refactor Profile page and enhance onboarding flow
Refactored `Profile.jsx` for improved readability, better state handling, and added new features like follow button and user stats. Introduced an onboarding flow with slides, updated `AppRoutes` for onboarding guard, and enhanced the design with new button styles. Minor improvements include better file upload logic in `EditPost.jsx`.

Refactor Profile page for improved UX and readability
Simplified state handling, improved data fetching logic, and enhanced layout for the Profile page. Removed unused functionalities, streamlined error handling, and improved design consistency by updating spacing and styles. Enhanced fallback mechanisms to ensure seamless user experience for incomplete data cases.

Refactor Profile page and improve UX across components
Refactored Profile page for enhanced user experience by adding modular components such as CoverPhoto, AvatarUploader, Tabs, and ThemeToggle. Streamlined loading, image upload functionality, and state handling, while introducing CSS variables for dynamic theming. Updated global and component-specific styles for better design consistency and responsiveness.

Refactor CreatePost page and integrate Leaflet map support.
Enhanced the CreatePost page with improved form structure, live preview functionality, tag handling, and better form validation. Added Leaflet and React-Leaflet libraries for map integration, updated styles for consistency, and revised dependencies in package.json. Adjusted global styling and included external Leaflet CSS in index.html for map display.

Refactor PostDetail page and improve UX.
Enhanced the PostDetail page with features like likes, bookmarks, and tag display. Updated comments handling and added new interactions including toggle like/bookmark functionality. Refined styling for improved responsiveness and consistency across components.

Refactor PostDetail page and update QuickPostForm.
Enhanced PostDetail page with features like likes, bookmarks, and improved UX, including refined styling and interactions. Updated QuickPostForm by cleaning up unused imports and maintaining code consistency.

Update dependencies to latest versions
Upgraded multiple dependencies in `package-lock.json`, including `@mui`, `@firebase`, `react-router`, and others to their latest stable versions. This ensures the project stays up to date with performance improvements, new features, and security patches.

Add .nvmrc and update dependencies to latest versions
Added a .nvmrc file to specify Node.js version 18. Updated various dependencies in the project, including `@mui`, `@firebase`, and `react-router`, to their latest stable releases. These changes ensure compatibility, improved performance, and inclusion of security patches.

Add .nvmrc and update dependencies to latest versions
Included .nvmrc file to define Node.js version 18, ensuring development consistency. Updated various dependencies such as `@mui`, `@firebase`, and `react-router` to their latest releases for improved performance, compatibility, and security. Also added comments to address linter warnings in multiple files.

Update .nvmrc, dependencies, and code improvements
Added .nvmrc to define Node.js version 18 for consistent development. Updated dependencies like `@mui`, `@firebase`, and `react-router` to their latest versions for better performance and security. Improved code by addressing linter warnings and simplifying unused variables in components.

Add admin dashboard components and enhance styling
Introduced new components for the admin dashboard: PostsOverTimeChart, AuditLogTable, SystemHealth, and updated UserManagement with edit/delete functionality. Integrated Chart.js and react-chartjs-2 for data visualization. Enhanced the admin styling with responsive layouts, improved charts, tables, and navigation styling for better UI/UX.

Refactor navbar styles and improve mobile responsiveness.
Reorganized and cleaned up SCSS for the navbar component to enhance readability and maintainability. Improved mobile styling by refining the navbar links' toggling behavior and ensuring better responsiveness. Simplified button classes for consistency.

Update Firestore reference usage for clarity and consistency.
Replaced direct `db` imports with explicitly aliased `firestore` references to improve code readability and alignment with naming conventions. Adjusted all Firestore function calls to use the updated `firestore` alias without changing functionality. Minor indentation fixes were applied for better code formatting.

MESSAGE.value: Fixed the bug for blank page on the main page
Fixed the events page now it openes the events

Add .idea/.gitignore to exclude IDE-specific files
This commit adds a .gitignore file under the .idea directory to prevent committing IDE-specific files. The ignored files include workspace settings, HTTP requests, and datasource configurations, ensuring a cleaner and more portable repository.

Refactor Profile.jsx and update IDE-specific settings
Refactored Profile.jsx to improve readability and handle edge cases for user data (e.g., missing fields). Updated .idea configurations to reflect recent changes, ensuring smoother local development without affecting project functionality.
